column1: Funeral service will be held 2:00 P.M. Saturday June 13
column2: 2015 at Siloam Baptist Church with burial to follow in the Church Cemetery. Her body will be taken to Siloam Baptist Church on Saturday morning where the family will receive friend from 12:00 Noon until time of her service at 2:00 PM. Rev. Bill Faw will conduct the services.
